pages.text: Lycanthropy is a ferocious disease that scars the mind, the body, and the soul. Under a full moon, its victims transform into a $(l:bewitchment:creatures/werewolf)Werewolf$() craving fresh meat.$(br2)While physically strong in beast form, $(l:bewitchment:introduction/silver)Silver$() will harm them, as will $(l:bewitchment:introduction/crops)Aconite$(). $(l:bewitchment:creatures/werewolf)Werewolves$() also exclusively feed on meat, no matter their form.

Their weakness to $(l:bewitchment:introduction/silver)Silver$() also implies an inability to hold tools such as an $(l:bewitchment:tools/athame)Athame$() for too long.$(br2)Lycanthropy is contracted from another $(l:bewitchment:creatures/werewolf)Werewolf$() - as long as it's not a newly infected lycanthrope - while under the $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curse$() of $(l:bewitchment:curses/susceptibility)Susceptibility$(); you must still $(l:bewitchment:poppets/death_protection)Somehow Survive$() though.$(br2)$(o)That sounds like a wonderful idea!$()
